1.02.text: I definitely am inspired by the people

4.05.text:
I'm around.  There's always something
going on, there's always interesting people to talk to.  My name is Jane Glasgow

9.68.text: and I've been working for Oracle for a year and a half.  What I do is, I show customers

12.82.text: the products that they're going to buy

16.63.text:
in HCM, Human Capital Management, HR applications.   What I'm
passionate about is

21.16.text: talking to people, I like trying to find ways to connect with them that really adds value

26.20.text:
to my customers' and my internal
customers' worlds.

29.67.text:
Personally  I'm pretty proud of actually
what we've done together as a band

33.80.text:
that's been kind of a fun thing that I've
done in the last year and a half

36.24.text:
Our band is called Scope Creep;  we are
six Oracle people that all got together

41.45.text: and most of the folks in the band are from the programming and development department

48.94.text: Basically we found eachother over a email distribution list, and after a couple of practices together

53.63.text: we were like, okay, let's do this!

63.35.text: Music is I'm just a part of life to me.   Once I started my professional

67.35.text: career, I was involved in other bands at other companies

71.22.text: but none of them really had the same cohesiveness as what I found here.

75.54.text: It's lot of fun when you have something that really drives you forward,

79.27.text: it's not like you feel so wiped out at the end of the day,

82.59.text: you feel energized from being able to work with people and

86.05.text: talk to folks throughout  the day, and then be able to go and just let off steam and play music at night.
